title: Can't find the LOLreplay folder!
body: So I know it should be in users/user/documents etc. However, when I check documents then nothing shows up. I can't find it. Is there anywhere else it might be?

replies.body:
Are you downloading the replays first? You have to be running the Beta Client, then hop into your match history and download the replay file for the match you'd like to watch (it must be in your match history to work). Once you've hit the 'download replay' button next to the match you'd like, it will create the Replays folder under *League of Legends* in your Documents folder. You can find more about the replays system in our [**FAQ.**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/234965248-Replays-FAQ-Pro-Tips)

Let me know if this helped!
